ems

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ems.Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object

    Manager

    The manager can manage the company, which involves add and remove customer, branch, linkage another manager.
    Version:
    v0.2-beta

        id - The id of Manager.
        name - The name of Manager.
        password - The password for the Manager to log in.
        gender - The gender of the Manager.
        status - The level of the Manager post.
